member.name: T:BitFlex.IO.CsvFile
member.summary: Represents a flat format, comma delimited data file format
member.remarks: This implementation does not fully support the latest RFC4810 specification. Currently the supported features are single line, comma delimited values. This does NOT support multi-line data or custom delimiters.

member.devdoc: Regex Pattern for Parsing CSV files with Embedded commas, double quotes and line breaksa
